messages.subject: used to be TV
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/10/02 1:24:05 PM, scribblers2@earthlink.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/10/02 1:24:05 PM, scribblers2@... writes:

<< no, never heard of Chasing Amy.. is that a movie? What's it about. >>

I hate to say.
Comic book authors and their social lives.

You might want to look up and read about it before just committing to having
a copy in your house even temporarily. It's a Jay and Silent Bob movie.
Stars a young Ben Affleck. It's one of the five (soon to be six) movies
directed by Kevin Smith:
Clerks
Mall Rats
Chasing Amy
Dogma
Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back

I know these things because of Marty, who has an interest.
Sandra
